title: Wood-derived Fe Cluster Reinforced Asymmetric Single-Atom Catalysts and Weather-Resistant Organohydrogel for Wide Temperature Flexible Zn–Air Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01226G, Paper
Jiachuan Chen, Chenglong Qiu, Lei Zhang, Baobin Wang, Penghua Zhao, Yu Zhao, Huanlei Wang, Guihua Yang, Aoran Sun, Jiaming Fan, Qixi Xv, Orlando J. Rojas
Flexible Zn–air batteries are typically constrained by sluggish oxygen electrocatalysis and electrochemical interface instability, and their operational range across wide temperatures are resultant restricted. Accordingly, we propose the wide temperature...
